channel.title: Please Help! NPC Error
channel.description:
I really need help, I set up my NPC in right spot but when im killing if i accidently walk under i get this error
[code]Starting server on port: 43594 Error loading banned hosts list. [ loaded Donators shop. ] [Ge Prices loaded] Noclip Loading! Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 [evildevilric] Unhandled button: 667, 11:65535 [evildevilric] Unhandled button: 79, 4:0 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8 at net.com.codeusa.world.clipInfo.checkPos(clipInfo.java:15) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:57) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendPlayerFollowing(NpcCombat .java:1898) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendAttackPlayer(NpcCombat.ja va:85) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.NPC.process(NPC.java:471) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:240) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]

item.title: Please Help! NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

In clipInfo find

public static byte coords[][][] = new byte[4][4000][4000]

Replace it with

public static byte coords[][][] = new byte[10001][10001][10001]

Read full topic
